name: Robyn The Town
description:
The one thing I forgot when on the rush to build was to tick the resizeable box so now this is just a small window heres the version with that actually ticked no other changes https://koolguy27.itch.io/robyn-the-town-resizeable I sure hope this aint too illegal tho since its got lesbians its kinda homophobic if ya dont let me do this 🤔 

Your beloved Princess has been caught with you, a woman from the poorest village and has been put to be executed in 7 days. In those 7 days you can steal from the rich to help your dying village and cause a revolution to storm the castle and save your Princess, or you can choose to do nothing for your village, hopefully bargaining with the king or sneakily saving her yourself. The game will be easier if you choose not to steal but your village will slowly turn against you as more people die, or you can make it harder as more guards are put out as your village thrives to help you. The fate of your village and your lover is in your hands.

All assets made within the jam

Balancing Aint Perfected :)

Intro cutscene not added in time:

E- Interact

Right Click- Use Item
